Our Mission

Currently, there is a sizeable barrier of entry for home coffee roasting. Roastero's mission is to make home coffee roasting accessible to everyone, not just the brave at heart. In order to make this mission a reality, Roastero seeks to create a platform where users can create and share roast recipes that interface with our software and supported roasters. In this way, a novice roaster can download a recipe with great reviews, purchase the green coffee the recipe calls for, and then achieve the same quality an experienced roaster achieves. Additionally, Roastero looks to provide ample resources to facilitate users to move from using other usersâ€™ recipes to creating their own, thus eliminating the barrier of entry to home coffee roasting.

Our Products

Our flagship product is an open source, cross-platform coffee roasting application. Currently, our application is compatible with the FreshRoast SR700 coffee roaster, with the potential to support any computer assisted, home roasting device. In order to share recipes, we have created the Roastero Cloud Platform designed as a central hub for users to share and explore roast recipes.

Our Philosophy

We decided at an early stage that we wanted our core application to be free and open source for the life of the product. The current state of home roasting involves a lot of modification, tinkering, and hacking. Released under GPLv3, Roastero continues this legacy, allowing users to have full control over their roasters. While designing the application, we wanted to maintain this level of control while providing a simplistic interface for an inexperienced user.

When Can I Download Roastero?

Roastero is currently being meticulously tested by a small group of beta users to ensure its quality upon release. In order to fund our project, we will be launching a kickstarter in July. This campaign will provide official release dates for Roastero and the Roastero Cloud Platform.
